data.notice:
Affiliates shall comply with Compliance Guidelines, which are attached hereto & and made a part of this agreement. This includes, but is not limited to, prohibiting spoofing. Affiliates are prohibited from altering sending domains to represent any domain not owned by Affiliate.

From and Subject Lines are NOT to be changed/altered - ensure you are only mailing approved assets.

Publicly Registered Domain:
All sending domains must be publicly registered
Domains cannot be registered with a proxy service
The domain must be registered at a location that is checked frequently and is not a proxy location
A reasonable path must be made available to identify the physical address and contact information of the publisher

No Network Syndication:
Direct mailers and internal mailing only
Company may not broker offer to any 3rd party under ANY CIRCUMSTANCES

Conditions:
*No Incentivized, General Internet or path traffic allowed. No re-brokering of offer to third party networks. No bidding on third party branded company names or product terms.
*Only approved assets may be used to promote campaigns, unless explicitly approved in advance
*Suppression files must be downloaded before every send
* Publisher must follow the CAN-SPAM compliance guidelines as defined by FTC.
* If marketing the offer via email, Affiliates must use two valid opt-out mechanisms. Including one for the advertiser.
* Use of deceptive from lines including friendly from and subject lines is strictly prohibited.
* Publisher must not use TraxStax name, or domain names, including any derivations or abbreviates thereof, in the originating email address line or subject line or domain token of any email transmission.
*Use of unauthorized language is prohibited and will not be considered paid leads
* Failure to comply with these Terms and campaign guidelines will result in non-payment.

Affiliates shall comply with Compliance Guidelines, which are attached hereto & and made a part of this agreement. This includes, but is not limited to, prohibiting spoofing. Affiliates are prohibited from altering sending domains to represent any domain not owned by Affiliate.
From and Subject Lines are NOT to be changed/altered - ensure you are only mailing approved assets.
Publicly Registered Domain:
All sending domains must be publicly registered
Domains cannot be registered with a proxy service

A reasonable path must be made available to identify the physical address and contact information of the publisher
No Network Syndication:
Direct mailers and internal mailing only
Company may not broker offer to any 3rd party under ANY CIRCUMSTANCES
Conditions:
*No Incentivized, General Internet or path traffic allowed. No re-brokering of offer to third party networks. No bidding on third party branded company names or product terms.
*Only approved assets may be used to promote campaigns, unless explicitly approved in advance
*Suppression files must be downloaded before every send
* Publisher must follow the CAN-SPAM compliance guidelines as defined by FTC.
* If marketing the offer via email, Affiliates must use two valid opt-out mechanisms. Including one for the advertiser.
* Use of deceptive from lines including friendly from and subject lines is strictly prohibited.
* Publisher must not use TraxStax name, or domain names, including any derivations or abbreviates thereof, in the originating email address line or subject line or domain token of any email transmission.
*Use of unauthorized language is prohibited and will not be considered paid leads
* Failure to comply with these Terms and campaign guidelines will result in non-payment.
